title: Tilthammer
description: The novel begins in 1740 with England still a feudal society, but the tilthammer of the iron industry has begun to pound out a rhythm which is to grow increasingly louder over the century. The Tilthammer is set in the Birmingham ironmaking industry of the 1700s, which traces the lives of two headstrong individuals.Also published as Woman of Iron by Sheila Holland.
author: Sheila Holland
